short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modestus Safeguard is a Chrome extension that filters unwanted content from your X and Reddit feeds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Modestus Safeguard is a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your social media experience by filtering out unwanted content from your X (formerly Twitter) and Reddit feeds.

Using a specialist LLM agent, Modestus effectively detects and blocks harmful content such as scam, spam, and toxic content, ensuring a cleaner and safer browsing experience.

For those who want even more control, Modestus allows users to customize their own filtering policies, tailoring the experience to meet their specific needs and preferences.

Whether you're tired of misleading posts, hate speech, or cluttered feeds, Modestus gives you the control to enjoy social media on your terms.

Supported Platforms:
- X (formerly Twitter)
- Reddit

Explore more at modestus.ai
